price: 36 Auraient-ils créé les cieux et la terre ? Non, mais ils n’ont aucune conviction.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
